entities.name: MongoDB Sharded Deployment

effectors.name: restart
effectors.description: Restart the process/service represented by an entity

effectors.name: start

parameters.name: locations
parameters.description: The location or locations to start in, as a string, a location object, a list of strings, or a list of location objects

effectors.description: Start the process/service represented by an entity

effectors.name: stop
effectors.description: Stop the process/service represented by an entity

sensors.name: service.isUp
sensors.description: Whether the service is active and availability (confirmed and monitored)

config.name: mongodb.colocated.router.group
config.description: Group to be monitored for the addition of new CoLocatedMongoDBRouter entities

config.name: mongodb.router.up.timeout
config.description: Maximum time to wait for the routers to become available before adding the shards

config.name: mongodb.shard.replicaset.size
config.description: Number of servers (mongod) in each shard (replicaset)

entities.description: MongoDB (from 'humongous') is a scalable, high-performance, open source NoSQL database
